values.description:
Newsquest is one of the UK's largest regional newspaper publishers with more than 200 newspapers, magazines and trade publications, including 17 paid-for dailies. Weekly readership: 13 million. Weekly circulation: 10 million. 
Daily titles include The Herald (Glasgow), The Northern Echo (Darlington), Telegraph & Argus (Bradford), Evening Times (Glasgow), Southern Daily Echo (Southampton), The Argus (Brighton), The Press (York), Oxford Mail and South Wales Argus (Newport). Weekly publications include Berrow's Worcester Journal, the oldest continuously published newspaper in the world.
values.name: Newsquest (North West) Ltd

values.description: Open Theatre Project is dedicated to the artistic & public community of Brookline, Brighton, Boston & Beyond. Through on-going Programs & Productions, Consistent Member & Audience Opportunities, and Constant Outreach to the world outside OTP, we hope to further define Art. For the Purpose of Community.

values.description:
Medical Devices & FMCG Recruitment Specialist

Brainhunters is a division of Brightpower Consulting Pty Ltd and owned solely by Laurie Brighton. Laurie has over 10 years experience in recruiting candidates in the FMCG sector and 6 years in the Healthcare sector. As Brainhunters, this boutique search & selection firm concentrates on roles in General/Business Management, Sales, Marketing, Product Management, Clinical Support, Field Service Engineering as well as Technical Applications, Operations, QA and Customer Service in the healthcare industry and Sales/Marketing/New Product Development & Operations in FMCG.

Laurie and her team have extensive knowledge and specialist recruiting experience for professionals in the Medical Devices sector with an emphasis on Orthopaedics, Spine, Neurosurgery, Anaesthesia and Critical Care, Cardiology, Cardiac Surgery, Vascular and Cardiac Intervention & CRM, Surgical specialties, Imaging etc. In FMCG, we specialize in food/beverage.
values.name: Brainhunters - a division of Brightpower Consulting Pty Ltd
Telemark Inc.
values.description:
Telemark (www.telemarkinc.com) and its affiliated companies serve the construction industry with integrity, maintaining its focus on quality and value true to its Scandinavian heritage. They served the industry in various capacities, as a General Contractor in the custom luxury residential market, as a Construction Manager (CM) in roles such as Owner’s Representation, Program Planning, and as a Service and Maintenance provider in roles such as estate management, facilities management, and a small projects division. Co-Founders Frank and Roy Dalene have established an impeccable reputation in several areas of the construction industry. 

Telemark received the 1998 Custom Builder of the Year Award, Best Home – Northeast Region from Custom Builder Magazine.
Telemark received the 2001 “LIBI Award”- Platinum Award, for Best Community Recreation Center in Oceana at Brighton Beach, Brooklyn, NY from the Long Island Builders Institute.

Hollywood Land provides development advice and land agency services to clients throughout the South East of England on single plots, larger development sites and refurbishment or conversion properties. Its sister company, Mishon Mackay Land, offers similar services and operates within East & West Sussex close to the vibrant city of Brighton & Hove.

Specialising in the sale of properties where the owner has secured planning themselves and simply wants to achieve the maximum value for the land; Hollywood Land also offers advice to owners who are looking to sell their property on a subject to planning basis where the obligation and risk of securing planning permission is placed on the buyer.
values.name: Hollywood Land Ltd

values.description:
PazMedia is a web design company based in Brighton who create business and personal websites locally and across the UK.

Our clients include creative entrepreneurs within the music industry, event promotions & management, printing & publishing and personal development coaching.

At PazMedia we can tailor our services to suit your needs, such as building a new website from scratch or updating an existing site.

We can make sure your website is in the top results on search engines by using the latest in Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) techniques to ensure your potential clients look at your website before viewing your competitors'.

PazMedia can also adapt the content of your website to mobile and touchscreen devices. This will make your website mobile-friendly and ensure the content loads quickly to the growing market of mobile web users.

We can create websites using WordPress which allows you to easily update the content and media yourself, with custom designs and functions. We can also implement an E-Commerce store into a new or existing site so you can start selling online.

From simple web pages to larger, more complex sites; PazMedia will provide you with a website you are happy with for an affordable price.

Visit us at www.pazmedia.co.uk
values.name: PazMedia

values.description:
L'Image Française specialises in the teaching of general conversational French at all levels.

In addition to providing classes in business French, preparation for general and specialised examinations such as the officially recognised DELF (Diplôme d’études en langue française) can also be provided.

I started my business 17 years ago in London with a strong emphasis on “in company” tuition. Teaching individuals and groups at their workplace as part of an employer's inhouse training scheme. Some of my key accounts were Elf (now Total), Société Générale and Bausch & Lomb. I moved my business activities to Brighton and Hove where I have been living since 2005.

I specialise in teaching professionals in connection with their work, training them to be able to read, write and converse in their specific business environments. I have particular expertise in the legal and financial services sectors

L'Image Française also provide a support service to anyone requiring help with French in respect of correspondence, communication and translation of official and administrative documents
 

Some of the areas covered are :

      Responding to a letter
    
      Phone calls
    
      Emails
    
      Property Transactions
    
      Utilities (Gas, Electric, Water etc)
    
      Social Security
    
      Tax Authorities
values.name: L'Image Francaise

values.description:
Shebang is a light blue homemade zine crammed with music features, travel guides, artist profiles, craft and any other interesting goings-on that catch our eye! We believe that the simple things in life should be celebrated and shared; the new favourite record you've found for pennies in a charity shop, the cake recipe your nan passed on or the gig last night that made your heart skip... 

Fed up of music and pop culture magazines selling more of a rock 'n' roll lifestyle than rock 'n' roll spirit, Shebang was created by Liv from paper scraps and glue in her bedroom. Despite spending a few afternoons photocopying and drawing up plans, Shebang never really took off until Liv moved in with graphic designer Lynsey a few years later, who helped to give the zine a makeover and turned it into a professionally printed mag. The zine now operates between Derbyshire (where Lynsey lives) and London (where Liv is now based), though it's roots will always be Falmouth in Cornwall and Brighton, where the first two issues were made.

We're not elitist with who we include in our pages; lesser-known bands as well as those currently courting the limelight lean against each page, and unknown artists and designers share their inspirations amid pretty illustrations and photographs. We also don't care about gender or labels, and just want to share the best bands and interesting creations, old and new, with others.
values.name: Shebang Magazine

values.description:
Lucas Creative started as a direct result of a quickly developing client base which grew though recommendations and a reputation for providing flexible, excellent value, high level design work for existing clients. Work is across the board with businesses large and small, public and private, in Brighton, the South East and London.

Services include:

Graphic design:
Corporate identity and logo design
Brochures, leaflets, corporate literature and annual reports
Exhibition graphics and exhibition advertising

Website design: 
HTML and CSS websites
Content management systems and Ecommerce
Flip-page e-zines and email marketing newsletters

Fundamental design approach should always based on effective communication – perhaps to ask a question, inform or prompt an action, change the public perception or simply making something easier to understand.
values.name: Lucas Creative

values.description:
I am a freelance illustrator based in Brighton, England. I graduated with a first class degree in illustration from Falmouth College of Art in 2006.

Since then I have worked for a broad range of clients, including The New York Times, Bon Iver, Chiswick House, Super Superficial, Clap Your Hands Say Yeah, The Yellow Bird Project and Plan B Magazine.

If you'd like to get in touch about any projects, ideas, or just to say hello, please contact hello@eleanorrudge.com
values.name: eleanorrudge.com

values.description:
Peyton and Byrne is a restaurant group, retail bakery and event company founded by restaurateur Oliver Peyton OBE. 
 
The business was founded in 2005 by renowned restaurateur Oliver Peyton along with his sister Siobhan Peyton, who holds the role of CEO. Over the last few years, the company has helped to transform the dining experience in public spaces, by significantly improving the quality of the food and drink offering within many of London’s famous national institutions and parks.

A new restaurant and bar at the Royal Academy - Keeper’s House launching autumn 2013 - will mark Peyton and Byrne’s ninth restaurant, adding to Restaurant at the Royal Academy of Arts, Inn the Park, The Wallace Restaurant, The National Café, The National Dining Rooms, The Orangery and Pavilion, both at Kew Gardens and the ICA Café Bar. 

In addition Peyton and Byrne also run several bakeries and cafés, located at The British Library, St Pancras Station and their most recent opening St Giles, near Covent Garden.

In March 2013, the company took its first steps outside of London – launching a selection of cafes, tea-shops and bars in Brighton’s cultural quarter. 

The events arm of the business, Peyton Events, caters for over 600 events a year including bespoke corporate and private events, weddings and large scale conferences.
Oliver was awarded an OBE earlier last year for services to the hospitality industry.

www.peytonandbyrne.com
values.name: Peyton & Byrne Ltd

values.description:
